sections.comment:
Import helpers and the font

  • sass-mq
  • frontend/standard/variables
  • Source Sans Pro font
sections.styles:
@import '../../../vendor/sass-mq/mq';
@import '../../../vendor/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets/bootstrap/_variables.scss';
@import '../../../vendor/frontend/app/assets/sass/variables/_standard.scss';
@import '../../../vendor/hiof-color/app/assets/sass/_variables';

@import "_variables";


@import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:400,200,200italic,300,600,300italic,400italic,600italic,700,700italic,900,900italic);

sections.comment:
REM setup and text-size-adjust

Set 1rem to be 10px as a size-base.
sections.styles:
html {
  font-size: 62.5%;
  //-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  //-webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  text-size-adjust: 100%;
}

:focus{
  outline: 3px solid $link-color;
  outline: .3rem solid $link-color;
}

sections.markup:
css
body,
.body,
#body {
 font-size: $body-font-size;
 line-height: $body-line-height;
 font-family: $body-font-family;
 font-style: normal;
 font-weight: 400;
}
sections.styles:
body,
.body,
#body {
  font-size: $body-font-size;
  line-height: $body-line-height;
  font-family: $body-font-family;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
}

sections.comment:
Headings

Headings. OpenType ligatures, discretionary ligatures and lining figures enabled if available.
sections.markup:
css
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
 font-feature-settings: 'dlig' 1, 'liga' 1, 'lnum' 1, 'kern' 1;
 font-style: normal;
 font-weight: 700;
 font-family: $h-font-family;
}
sections.styles:
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
  font-feature-settings: 'dlig' 1, 'liga' 1, 'lnum' 1, 'kern' 1;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-family: $h-font-family;
}

sections.comment: Dotted underline on links within the content section

Paragraphs

Paragraphs. OpenType ligatures and oldstyle figures enabled if available.

Code block. Some styles from normalize included.

Some styles from normalize included.
Letter space those capitals people, Jan Tschichold would be proud.
Special styling for inline-editing notes from the admission office

Box sizing

Setup all elements with box-sizing:border-box (this includes the padding in the element width)

sections.markup:
css
@mixin floatAndStandardSpacing(){
    float: left;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    padding: 0 1rem;
}
sections.styles:
@mixin floatAndStandardSpacing(){
    float: left;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    padding: 0 1rem;
}

sections.comment:
Layout classes

Sets the layout up using the .lo- prefix. The following options are available:

  • .lo-full{} (100% width of the parrent)
  • .lo-half{} (50% width of the parrent)
  • .lo-quarter{} (25% width of the parrent)
  • .lo-auron-1-3{} (38.2% width of the parrent)
  • .lo-auron-2-3{} (61.8% width of the parrent)
  • .lo-one-third{} (33% width of parrent)
  • .lo-two-thirds{} (66% width of parrent)

<div class="c-bg-pink lo-full">Full width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-pink lo-half">half width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-purple lo-half">half width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-aquablue lo-quarter">quarter width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-pink lo-quarter">quarter width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-purple lo-quarter">quarter width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-pink lo-quarter">quarter width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-aquablue lo-auron-1-3">lo-auron-1-3 width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-seagreen lo-auron-2-3">lo-auron-2-3 width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-purple lo-one-third">lo-one-third width element</div>
<div class="c-bg-pink lo-two-thirds">lo-two-thirds width element</div>
sections.styles:
.lo-full,
.lo-half,
.lo-quarter,
.lo-auron-1-3,
.lo-auron-2-3,
.lo-one-third,
.lo-two-thirds {
    @include floatAndStandardSpacing;
}

html,
#body,
.body {
    width: 100%;
}


#body,
.body {
    //padding-top: 4rem;
    min-height: 80rem;
    overflow-x: hidden;
}

#main,
.main {
    padding-top: 4.4rem;
}

#header,
.header,
#main,
.main,
#footer,
.footer {
    max-width: 104rem;
    margin: 0 auto;
    // IE11 fix since it lacks UA styling
    display: block;
}

#content,
.content {
    padding-left: 2rem;
    min-height: 30rem;
    > header {
        position: relative;
        //min-height: 7rem;
    }
}

#main,
.main{
  footer header {
    h2 {
        padding-left: 2rem;
    }
  }
}
.float-left {
    float: left;
}

.float-right {
    float: right;
}

html.index {
    .lo-full,
    .lo-half,
    .lo-auron-1-3,
    .lo-auron-2-3 {
        header {
            h2 {
                float: left;
            }
        }
    }
}

header.lo-full {
    padding-left: 0;
}

#content,
.content,
#sidebar,
.sidebar {
    padding-top: 2rem;
}

@include mq($until: small) {
    .lo-full,
    .lo-half,
    .lo-quarter,
    .lo-auron-1-3,
    .lo-auron-2-3,
    .lo-one-third,
    .lo-two-thirds {
        width: 100%;
    }
    #main,
    .main {
        padding-top: 0rem;
    }
    #people,
    #calendar,
    #research,
    #news {
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    #people {
        .lo-full {
            padding: 0;
        }
    }
    #calendar {
        .lo-half {
            width: 50%;
            padding: 0;
        }
    }
    #research,
    #news {
        .lo-quarter {
            padding: 0;
        }
    }
}

@include mq($from: small, $until: large) {
    .lo-full {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .lo-half {
        width: 50%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-one-third {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-two-thirds {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-quarter {
        width: 50%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-auron-1-3 {
        width: 100% * 0.382;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-auron-2-3 {
        width: 100% * 0.618;
        //width: 100%;
    }
    #people,
    #calendar,
    #research,
    #news {
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    #people {
        .lo-full {
            padding: 0;
        }
    }
    #calendar {
        .lo-half {
            width: 50%;
            padding: 0;
        }
    }
    #research,
    #news {
        .lo-quarter {
            padding: 0 .5rem;
        }
    }
}

@include mq($from: large) {

    .lo-full {
        width: 100%;
    }
    .lo-half {
        width: 50%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-quarter {
        width: 25%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-auron-1-3 {
        width: 100% * 0.382;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-auron-2-3 {
        width: 100% * 0.618;
    }
    .lo-one-third {
        width: 31%;
        margin-left: 1%;
        margin-right: 1%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-two-thirds {
        width: 62%;
        margin-left: 1%;
        margin-right: 1%;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .lo-first {
        padding-left: 0;
    }
    .lo-last {
        padding-right: 0;
    }
    .lo-auron-2-3 {
        .lo-quarter {}
        .lo-first {
            padding-left: 0;
        }
        .lo-last {
            padding-right: 0;
        }
    }
    #people,
    #calendar {
        padding-top: 1rem;
    }
}

@function trans($color, $percentage) {
  @return lighten($color, (1-$percentage)*5%);
}

sections.markup:
@mixin transtohex($type, $color, $percentage) {
    @if $type == color {
        color: trans($color, $percentage);
        //color: rgba($color, $percentage);
    }
    @if $type == bg {
        background-color: trans($color, $percentage);
        //background-color: rgba($color, $percentage);
    }
}
sections.styles:
@mixin transtohex($type, $color, $percentage) {
    @if $type == color {
        color: trans($color, $percentage);
        //color: rgba($color, $percentage);
    }
    @if $type == bg {
        background-color: trans($color, $percentage);
        //background-color: rgba($color, $percentage);
    }
}

sections.markup:
$c-black: #000;
$c-white: #fff;
$c-pink: #D77869;
$c-seagreen: #6FC2B4;
$c-lightwarmgrey:#ECEAE5;
$c-warmgrey:#C8C2BE;
$c-purple:#A396A3;
$c-aquablue:#347E84;
$hiof-blue: #073B58;
$color-primary-action: #3276b1;
$navbar-default-link-color: $color-primary-action;
$black: $c-black;
$white: $c-white;
$array: (black: $c-black, white: $c-white, pink: $c-pink, seagreen: $c-seagreen, lightwarmgrey: $c-lightwarmgrey, warmgrey: $c-warmgrey, purple: $c-purple, aquablue: $c-aquablue);
$tints: (85: .85, 60: .60, 45: .45, 30: .30, 15: .15);
